mapper.insert: insert into Users(loginId, password, password_q, password_a, name, nickname, email, phone, addr, bdate, kakaoface) values(#{loginId},#{password},#{password_q},#{password_a},#{name},#{nickname},#{email},#{phone},#{addr},#{bdate}, #{kakaoface})
mapper.update: update Users set password=#{password}, password_q=#{password_q}, password_a=#{password_a}, name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickname} ,email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, addr=#{addr} where userNo=#{userNo}
